attributes.action: Make mental health a top priority within schools
attributes.background: The pressure within the modern day school system has made mental health problems rife within schools. The government should review this and give additional support with dealing with these problems for school students

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about mental health in schools. But we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/260373
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234118
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252934
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250915
